verses.roman:
jyaiṣṭhe--trivikrama, āṣāḍhe--vāmana deveśa
śrāvaṇe--śrīdhara, bhādre--deva hṛṣīkeśa

synonyms: jyaiṣṭhe—in the month of Jyaiṣṭha (May-June); trivikrama—Trivikrama; āṣāḍhe—in the month of Āṣāḍha (June-July); vāmana deva-īśa—Lord Vāmana; śrāvaṇe—in the month of Śrāvaṇa (July-August); śrīdhara—Śrīdhara; bhādre—in the month of Bhādra (August-September); deva hṛṣīkeśa—Lord Hṛṣīkeśa.
translation: "In the month of Jyaiṣṭha, the predominating Deity is Trivikrama. In Āṣāḍha the Deity is Vāmana, in Śrāvaṇa the Deity is Śrīdhara, and in Bhādra the Deity is Hṛṣīkeśa.
